fg_event_data Struct Reference

#include <fgrab_define.h>

Detailed Description

placeholder for user defined event function argument to be passed to the event callback.

This struct is not defined anywhere within Silicon Software code, it is only passed to the event handler function to give it some working context. Just define the struct in your software with the values you need.

See also:
Fg_registerEventHandler()
